usefulItems: 12 hole muffin tin, airtight container, oven, refrigerator
title: Broccoli and Bacon Tarts

ingredients.content: 25 g extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for greasing
1 - 2 pinches ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and liberally grease a 12 hole muffin tin with oil.
Place carrots, onions and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>4 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add bacon, insert simmering basket then add broccoli florets and salt. Cook <b>10 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula. Divide broccoli and bacon-vegetable mixture between prepared muffin holes.
Place cream, eggs and pepper in mixing bowl then mix <b>10 sec//speed 3<b>. Pour evenly between muffin holes.
Sprinkle with cheese then bake for 20-25 minutes (180°C) until set and golden.
Allow to cool then store in an airtight container in fridge until ready to take on your picnic.
